net.proteusframework.core.geo

Class USAndCanadaRegionInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.geo.RegionInformation
      • net.proteusframework.core.geo.USAndCanadaRegionInformation

  • final class USAndCanadaRegionInformation
extends RegionInformation
    Region information implementation based on USStates and CanadaProvinces.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getRegionCode

        public String getRegionCode(String isoLanguage,
                   String isoCountryCode,
                   String... regionCodeOrName)
        Description copied from class: RegionInformation
        Return the region code for the specified regionName.
        Specified by:
        getRegionCode in class RegionInformation
        Parameters:
        isoLanguage - optional language. If not specified, performance may suffer.
        isoCountryCode - the ISO country code.
        regionCodeOrName - the region path if known; otherwise only the name is required. At least one element (name) must be supplied.
        Returns:
        the region code or null if not found.

      • getRegionName

        public String getRegionName(String isoLanguage,
                   String isoCountryCode,
                   String... regionCode)
        Description copied from class: RegionInformation
        Get a region name in the specified language. If the name isn't available in the specified language then a name will be returned in an implementation default language.

        Example (implementation dependent):

        • getRegionName("en", "US", "NE") => Nebraska
        • getRegionName("en", "US", "NE", "001") => Adams County
        • getRegionName("fr", "US", "NE", "001") => Comt√© d'Adams

        Specified by:
        getRegionName in class RegionInformation
        Parameters:
        isoLanguage - the language.
        isoCountryCode - the ISO country code.
        regionCode - the region code(s). At least one region code must be provided.
        Returns:
        the name or the last specified region code if no name is found.

      • getSubRegionCodes

        public List<String> getSubRegionCodes(String isoCountryCode,
                             String... regionCode)
        Description copied from class: RegionInformation
        Get the sub-region codes for the specified country and regions.
        Specified by:
        getSubRegionCodes in class RegionInformation
        Parameters:
        isoCountryCode - the ISO country code.
        regionCode - optional list of regions.
        Returns:
        a mutable list of region codes.
